alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 28 at 4:00AM EDT until September 29 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Middle and Upper Keys. * WHEN...Through Friday morning, especially during the high tides after sunrise. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
